title: Unintentional ally: How Mikel Landa saved the Vuelta a España for Sepp Kuss
content:
Analysis: The Angliru summit finale was the turning point in the Coloradan's eventual victory, and the Basque climber played a pivotal if unintentional role.

Read the full article at Unintentional ally: How Mikel Landa saved the Vuelta a España for Sepp Kuss on Velo.
author: ahood
